title: Pleading my 20 minute queue.
body:
Just wondering if there is any way to plead it. My power cut off mid game and it didnt come on for about one hour after and i got placed into a lower priority queue are there any rioters that would be able to help?

Thank you.

replies.body: low priority queue doesnt happen from just one game, it sucks that your power goes off but it sucks more for the 4 people on your team that lose cause of one person afking

Surely there are circumstances that could appeal the process right?

I was just playing - and had to use the toilet as the game started. I did say i'd be right back - but the team lost fb and did a /remake and I came back 90 seconds later to a defeat, loss of lp and a 10m LPQ (I went through the first one which was my fault).

What am I supposed to do? Piss myself? Systems like that in my opinion you shouldn't have in the first <3~5 minutes of the game.
[Unfortunately you are unable to be removed from LPQ under any circumstances.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q6)
